1: May God be gracious to us and bless us. May his face shine on us— Interlude
2: so that your way may be known on earth, your salvation among all nations.
3: May the peoples praise you, O God. May the peoples praise you—all of them.
4: May the countries be glad and sing for joy, because you rule the peoples with fairness, and you guide the countries of the earth. Interlude
5: May the peoples praise you, O God. May the peoples praise you—all of them.
6: The earth will yield its harvest. God, our God, will bless us.
7: God will bless us, and all the ends of the earth will fear him.
